text: 🚨 Gaza: Infection prevention and control measures critical amid conflict 💦🏥 Overcrowding, poor sanitation, and disrupted healthcare services heighten risk of disease spread 🌟 Technical note provides crucial guidance for healthcare and shelter settings 👉 Ensure safe water, sanitation, hand hygiene, IPC supplies, and appropriate PPE use 💪 Adhere to cleaning and disinfection protocols to maintain a safe healthcare environment 🏥🚨
